thread.title: Dir-EM Merch. Athletic Specialty Marketplace - Sports Equipment
thread.title_full: Dir-EM Merch. Athletic Specialty Marketplace - Sports Equipment

title: Dir-EM Merch. Athletic Specialty Marketplace - Sports Equipment
text: Drives geo cross-category/concept assortment direction to ensure a holistic premium, differentiated, and integrated marketplace.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
